COUNT(ORDER_T.BRD_ID) AS COUNT

BRD_ID
BRD_NM
CRT_DT_TM
CRT_USR_NM

) ORDER_T ) T WHERE 1=1
AND rn BETWEEN #{listViewCount} * (((#{start} + #{length}) / #{listViewCount}) - 1) + 1 AND #{listViewCount} * ((#{start} + #{length}) / #{listViewCount})

SELECT /* Admin.boardDetail */ BRD_ID , BRD_NM , BRD_DESC , BRD_TYPE , BRD_ADM_USR , BRD_CRT_AUTH , BRD_VIEW_AUTH , POST_TYPE_YN , POST_TAG_YN , POST_FILE_YN , POST_CMNT_YN , POST_CMNT_FILE_YN , POST_POPUP_YN , POST_SECRET_YN , POST_FIX_YN , DEL_YN , CRT_DT_TM , CRT_USR_ID , CRT_USR_ID AS CRT_USR_NM , MOD_DT_TM , MOD_USR_ID FROM PORTAL.PT_BOARD WHERE 1=1 AND BRD_ID = #{BRD_ID}

WITH /* Admin.logList */ LOG_LIST AS ( SELECT plog.LOG_ID , plog.USR_ID , userInfo.OBJECT_NAME AS USR_NM , plog.USR_DEPT_ID , plog.USR_DEPT_NM , plog.USR_POS_ID , plog.USR_POS_NM , plog.USR_IP , plog.SCRN_ID , plog.SCRN_DET_ID , plog.USR_ACTN , plog.DET_INFO_MAP , plog.CRT_DT_TM
, board.BRD_NM , post.POST_TITLE
FROM PORTAL.PT_PORTAL_LOG plog
INNER JOIN PORTAL.PT_BOARD board ON plog.SCRN_ID = TO_CHAR(board.BRD_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN PORTAL.PT_BOARD_POST post ON ( plog.SCRN_ID = TO_CHAR(post.BRD_ID) AND plog.SCRN_DET_ID = TO_CHAR(post.POST_ID) )
WHERE 1=1
AND plog.SCRN_ID IN('PORTAL', 'EIS')
) SELECT * FROM ( SELECT
COUNT(ORDER_T.LOG_ID) AS COUNT
ROWNUM rn , ORDER_T.*
FROM ( SELECT * FROM LOG_LIST ORDER BY
LOG_ID
USR_ID
USR_NM
USR_IP
SCRN_ID
SCRN_DET_ID
USR_ACTN
CRT_DT_TM
1
ASC
DESC
DESC
) ORDER_T ) T WHERE 1=1
AND rn BETWEEN #{listViewCount} * (((#{start} + #{length}) / #{listViewCount}) - 1) + 1 AND #{listViewCount} * ((#{start} + #{length}) / #{listViewCount})
